Summary: Circular/Round -- possibly convex on visible portion of disk
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lemoore
There were no other sightings in Lemoore on or around October 30th 2009
divs: sighting detailswhile working in the yard of a residence in lemoore, ca, at approximately 3:28 pm, i noticed a round, orange colored stationary object in the sky slightly to the north of my vantage point. presuming it to be either a mylar balloon or other such object, i at first gave little thought as to the nature of the object. after looking away and then back at the object, i noticed that it appeared to be stationary in position, not drifting as a wayward balloon or other such object would act. at this point i was intrigued and started to observe the object intently, wondering as to just what it could be to hold a stationary position, yet be so clearly visible in the sky. my initial conclusion ��� after discounting the possibility that it was a commercial airliner operated by southwest airlines (who���s planes are painted orange and are clearly visible as such) was that it could possibly be a weather sonde balloon or a commercial dirigible, such as an airship of the goodyear fleet. this possibility did not, however, explain the stationary aspect of the object, and quite intrigued, i retrieved a pair of 10 x 50 mm binoculars from within the home that i was working at and returned to the yard where i was able to relocate the object. using the binoculars i was unable to determine the size\shape\distance of the object, due to handshake and my inability to determine the focal distance to the object. lying on my back and propping up the binoculars with my arm resting on the ground, i attempted to focus on the still stationary object. through the perspective gained through the binoculars, it appeared as if the object was round in shape and possibly convex on the portion visible from my perspective. it is also possible that the object was segmented (as if to observe an orange from a polar view, bereft of its peel.) as i starred at the object, grasping for a logical explanation of just what it could be, the object ��� within a few seconds ��� became silver in color, and began to travel towards the west. at this time the object began to accelerate at what seemed to be an ever increasing rate. i tracked the object towards the west for about 35 degrees of arc when the object abruptly changed direction towards the northwest for a fraction of a second and then immediately jogged back upon its path and headed southwest, making what appeared to be a zee pattern. i then lost visual track of the object as it traveled out of my vantage that was precluded by the trees on the western edge of the property. i would estimate the total duration of this sighting to be approximately two minutes and am unable to fashion a logical explanation for the size\shape\movements of the object based on my own knowledge of the currently in-service airships of the world governments. i speculated that this could have been a capsule-type re-entry vehicle, however the rapid acceleration and changes of direction does not support this conclusion. the possibility that the object was some kind of balloon is also highly unlikely due to the fact that this type of airship does not accelerate or change direction as this object did. my personal speculation on the matter ��� based on my observations ��� is that the object was at least at large as the international space station and when first observed was at a lower altitude and thus was illuminated by the sun while located at the very fringes of the atmosphere (hence the orange color.) the object then descended vertically into the atmosphere (turning silver in appearance) and proceeded westward towards the location of naval air station lemoore before twice changing direction (first north then south) and traveling southwestward towards vandenberg air force base. this object made no detectable noise and left no visible contrail so i must conclude that this object is a yet secret aircraft operated by the u.s. military that is capable of outer-atmospheric altitudes and super-sonic speeds or was of extra-terrestrial origin and exceeds all capabilities of currently existing aircraft.
